short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add your video and start editing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hello,
PowerDirector for PC/Mac editor, easy to use for Chrome.

Powerful extensions to edit any video.

This extension is a video editing tool designed to help professionals cut, edit, refine, publish and share videos. Artists can layer, blend and shape to create artistic scenes, add text or graphics to footage and use a drag-and-drop interface to adjust transitions.

PowerDirector for Chrome allows professionals to add titles and shapes to videos using templates and keyframe controls. Content creators can shoot, edit and share videos across multiple social media platforms such as TikTok, Facebook, YouTube, and more.

PowerDirector for Chrome enables users to customize the system according to requirements for a personalized video experience.
